value.content:
[
  {
    "type": "deprecated_algorithm",
    "severity": "high",
    "algorithm": "SHA-1",
    "description": "SHA-1 is deprecated due to collision vulnerabilities and is no longer considered cryptographically secure for signatures or integrity checks.",
    "evidence": "SHA-1 initialization vectors detected at 0x1468",
    "recommendation": "Replace SHA-1 with SHA-256 or SHA-3 for all cryptographic purposes"
  },
  {
    "type": "deprecated_algorithm",
    "severity": "critical",
    "algorithm": "MD5",
    "description": "MD5 is deprecated and critically vulnerable to collision attacks. It should not be used for any cryptographic security purposes.",
    "evidence": "MD5 initialization constants detected at 0x1468",
    "recommendation": "Immediately replace MD5 with SHA-256 or SHA-3 for all hashing needs"
  },
  {
    "type": "deprecated_algorithm",
    "severity": "critical", 
    "algorithm": "RC4",
    "description": "RC4 stream cipher is deprecated due to significant biases in its keystream that can lead to practical attacks.",
    "evidence": "RC4 Key Scheduling Algorithm (KSA) pattern found at 0x0c95",
    "recommendation": "Replace RC4 with modern stream ciphers like ChaCha20 or use authenticated encryption modes"
  },
  {
    "type": "hardcoded_secret",
    "severity": "critical",
    "algorithm": "DES",
    "description": "Multiple hardcoded 8-byte keys or IVs detected in binary's constant section, exposing potential encryption secrets.",
    "evidence": "10 hardcoded 8-byte candidates found in __TEXT,__const section at offsets 0x100001368-0x100001371",
    "extracted_value": "Multiple 8-byte hex sequences including 78a46ad756b7c7e8",
    "recommendation": "Remove hardcoded keys, use secure key management systems, implement key rotation"
  },
  {
    "type": "weak_key_size",
    "severity": "high",
    "algorithm": "RSA",
    "description": "Potential weak RSA implementation with low operation complexity suggesting insufficient key generation",
    "evidence": "Modular arithmetic with low complexity (MUL:35, DIV:7, SHIFT:19)",
    "recommendation": "Use RSA-2048 or RSA-4096, verify key generation uses cryptographically secure random number generation"
  }
]
